description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Sweet Pork Kebabs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Rice,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sticky Sweet Pork Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onion, cut into 16 thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Trim excess fat from pork, cut into 2cm cubes and place in a bowl. Combine sauces, sugar and ginger in a jar. Add half of the sauce mixture to the pork and toss to coat. Cover and set aside for 15 minutes.
Combine pineapple, cucumber, coriander and chilli in a bowl. Heat a barbecue or chargrill on high.

Thread pork (3 pieces) and onion (2 pieces) onto skewers. Reduce barbecue heat to low. Spray kebabs with oil. Cook for 6-8 minutes, turning and basting with remaining marinade, until cooked through. Serve with rice, cucumber and pineapple salad.
